import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { BranchContext } from "../context/BranchContext" const UpdateBranch = (props) => { const {branchID} = useParams() const {branches} = useContext(BranchContext) const [branchName, setBranchName] = useState("") const [managerID, setManagerID] = useState("") return

{branches[0].branchName}

setBranchName(e.target.value)} branchID="branch_name" className="form-control" type="text" />
setManagerID(e.target.value)} branchID="manager_id" className="form-control" type="text" />
} export default UpdateBranch
